Class AutoSetup

java.lang.Object
ci553.ministore.clients.start.AutoSetup
public class AutoSetup extends Object
Utility class for automatic setup of the MiniStore application. Controls whether the setup process should run automatically and initializes the setup if needed.

    Initializes the setup process if automatic setup is enabled.

  • Constructor Details

    • AutoSetup

      public AutoSetup()

  • Method Details

    • setRunAuto

      public static void setRunAuto(boolean value)
      Sets the flag to control automatic setup.
      Parameters:
      value - True to enable automatic setup, false to disable.

    • isRunAuto

      public static boolean isRunAuto()
      Checks if automatic setup is enabled.
      Returns:
      True if automatic setup is enabled, false otherwise.

    • initializeIfNeeded

      public static void initializeIfNeeded()
      Initializes the setup process if automatic setup is enabled. If the runAuto flag is true, it runs the Setup.main method to perform the setup.
